title: SparkKitty Swipes Pics From iOS, Android Devices
summary: SparkKitty Swipes Pics From iOS, Android Devices. Like its predecessor, SparkCat, the new malware appears to be going after sensitive data — such as seed phrases for cryptocurrency wallets — in device photo galleries....
content: Like its predecessor, SparkCat, the new malware appears to be going after sensitive data — such as seed phrases for cryptocurrency wallets — in device photo galleries.
